title: Fizik Gravita Tensor and Versor MTB shoes go DH, with flat and clipless options
content: Hot on the tail of Fizik’s eMTB flats are two all-new mountain biking shoes for enduro and downhill. Fizik Gravita denotes their new Gravity Series, populated today by the Tensor and Versor MTB shoes. Both have a clean, ergonomic aesthetic and are available in flat-pedal and clipless options. Here’s everything you need to know. Fizik […]
author: Jessie-May Morgan
